en.title: GDG Montreal | Tech Meetups | Google Developer Groups | Flutter Montreal | WTM Montreal
en.description: Join Montreal's premier tech community! GDG Montreal brings together developers, designers, and tech enthusiasts through regular meetups, workshops, and events. Explore our network of 4 active groups including GDG Montreal, Flutter Montreal, Women Techmakers Montreal, and GDG Cloud Montreal.

fr.title: GDG Montreal | Rencontres Tech | Google Developer Groups | Flutter Montreal | WTM Montreal
fr.description: Rejoignez la première communauté tech de Montréal ! GDG Montreal rassemble développeurs, designers et passionnés de technologie à travers des rencontres régulières, ateliers et événements. Explorez notre réseau de 4 groupes actifs incluant GDG Montreal, Flutter Montreal, Women Techmakers Montreal et GDG Cloud Montreal.
